981560.name: Pixelbator
981560.description:
Browse, watch videos, don't get caught!
Pixelbator is influenced by the hilarious getting caught stories told by many. This is an exaggerated natural need, and we try to tell it in some dark, nostalgic, funny way.

About
You have to finish your job without getting caught. Our hero is a sneaky guy having difficulties with his situation. Your family is definitely not the most understanding family at all. The year is 2005 and the things weren't that easy at those times.

Gameplay
While you try to finish your job, people will be harassing you through various ways. But these people are not the only thing you should be worrying. You will encounter with lots of popups, ads and other annoying internet stuff. Choosing which video to watch is important, because every single one of them affects differently. How much you enjoy from the videos depend on how you watch them. If you watch them half screen, without sound or low resolution, you will enjoy them less. In the meantime you should interact with the objects in your room and learn how to use them for your benefits. Before the time ends, you need to watch enough videos and take maximum pleasure as you can from them.

Content
  • 5 family members, 2 daily acquaintances and a dog. Each one has a distinctive behavior
  • Interactive room
  • 40 actors and actresses
  • Thousands of different videos
  • There is actually a scenario
  • Messenger for keeping up with your friends
  • Browser for wandering on the many websites and watching videos
  • Popups
  • Ads
  • Spams
  • Low speed internet

And various other internet scum awaits you!
981560.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
